sentences.sContent: And I prefer to an ampere meter being made of aluminum even though it has analog to another one.
sentences.sContent_eng: And I prefer to an ampere meter being made of aluminum even though it has analog to another one.
sentences.sCn: 我还想要一个铝制的安培表，虽然它与另一个类似。

sentences.sContent: A static magnetic field is measured in units of ampere per metre, (A/m) but is usually expressed in terms of the corresponding magnetic induction measured in units of tesla, (T) or millitesla (mT).
sentences.sContent_eng: A static magnetic field is measured in units of ampere per metre, (A/m) but is usually expressed in terms of the corresponding magnetic induction measured in units of tesla, (T) or millitesla (mT).
sentences.sCn: 静电磁场以每米具有的安培单位衡量(A/m)，但是通常以相应的电磁感应单位特斯拉(T)或毫伏特斯拉(mT)表示。

sentences.sContent: Five nanogenerators working together produced about 1 micro ampere output current at 3 volts about the same voltage generated by two regular AA batteries.
sentences.sContent_eng: Five nanogenerators working together produced about 1 micro ampere output current at 3 volts about the same voltage generated by two regular AA batteries.
sentences.sCn: 5个纳米发电机同时工作可以产生1微安培3伏特的输出电流，与2节普通的5号电池所产生的电压差不多。

trans.tranCn: 安培（计算电流强度的标准单位）
